name: Mana's Bond
effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 25%

name: Mana's Bond
瑪娜血脈
마나의 핏줄
Lien de mana
Erbe des Mana
Vínculo de mana
desc_short: Boost ATK by 10% and resistance to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone.
提高10%攻擊、中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性
공격력 10%, 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승
Augmente l'ATT de 10% et la rés. au poison, à cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification
ANG + 10 % und Resistenz gegen Gift/ Blenden/ Schlaf/ Stille/ Lähmung/ Konfus/ Virus/ Stein
Aumenta el ATQ un 10% y res. a estados alterados
desc_long: Boosts ATK by 10% and resistance to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone.
提高10%攻擊與中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性。
공격력이 10%, 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 질병, 석화 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente l'ATT de 10% et la rés. au poison, à cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie et pétrification.
ANG + 10 % und Resistenz gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein.
